references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational text-to-image diffusion model that is used as a basis for many subsequent methods including the one described in this paper.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper presents another highly influential text-to-image diffusion model that significantly advanced the field and is frequently compared to in this paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-resolution image generation method, which is directly relevant to the topic of consistent text-to-image generation and is referenced frequently.

references.paper_title: The chosen one: Consistent characters in text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it directly addresses the problem of consistent identity preservation in text-to-image generation, which is the central focus of this paper.
This paper introduces a training-free approach to consistent image generation, which is directly compared to in this paper and represents a significant advancement in the field.
